properties.areaDesc: Whitley, KY; Bell, KY; Knox, KY
properties.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued February 5 at 9:19PM EST until February 6 at 12:15AM EST by NWS Jackson KY
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a

* Flash Flood Warning for...
Central Bell County in southeastern Kentucky...
Southern Knox County in southeastern Kentucky...
Southeastern Whitley County in south central Kentucky...

* Until 1215 AM EST.

* At 919 PM EST, Doppler radar and automated rain gauges indicated
heavy rain falling across the warned area. Over two inches of rain
have already fallen. Flash flooding is expected to begin shortly.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Barbourville, Pineville, Julip, Artemus, Swan Lake, Clate,
Birdseye, Barnyard, Verne, Gausdale, King and Louden.

Additional rainfall amounts of another inch or so are possible in
the warned area.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the
dangers of flooding.

CMAMtext: NWS: FLASH FLOOD WARNING this area til 12:15 AM EST. Avoid flooded areas.
